A solid game all around. I'm not a fan of the horror genre, but playing this game as Killer helped ease me into playing it as Survivor. If you're anything like me, you'll more than likely be able to get over it after a few rounds on Survivor. At this point, high-skill survivors are scarier to me than playing survivor.

I used to like playing this game but the direction it is going in recently has made me unhappy playing this game. Until dbd gets competition I do not want to play it because they are not trying to fix the game. Playing killer no longer had the spark it did and playing survivor is the only way to have fun for me anymore because of how easy it is. Thanks, BHVR. See you in a couple of months when hopefully VHS shows that it has a lot of potential and BHVR realizes it has to take advice and actually change their game to make it more fun to play. If you can get it for $2 or free then its worth it but for the amount of money it goes for do not buy this game. Oh and you'll have to buy dlc's in the game to get killers and survivors unless you want to spend many hours getting this others can buy for a few dollars.

1 Year Edit : It got worse.

Poor game. Good concept but dirty application, huge advantage to the side of the killer, if you are not an excellent survivor the killer can manage pretty easily 4 kills.
To give an extra power to the killer he can put a 'mori' this make the match much easier for the killer.
I play a lot this game but now im really borred. Also if you dont have a good pc don't buy the game, the optimization is so bad and you can find a lot of bug aswell.
The server lantency is also a problem and again the advantage from that is for... the killer good answer.
Go find another survival game until this game is debug and fix.

Edit : Now the devs try to make the mori with the killer directly like PH or the sadako

[b]Dead by Daylight[/b] aka DbD is an asymmetrical 4v1 cat and mouse game. There are 4 survivors and 1 killer; the survivors need to work as a team and fix 5 generators to have a chance to open the exit gate thus escaping all while the overpowered killer is hunting down survivors to sacrifice them to The Entity. 

At first this game is quite scary as survivor and difficult as killer. You can't seem to ever escape the killer and you die super fast, and as a killer you can't end chases quick enough resulting in a gen rush. All this ends when you learn how to loop which is the main mechanic of the game. [b]Looping[/b] is where the majority of the fun is had and when you can finally begin mind gaming as both the killer and the survivor. The [b]looping[/b] mechanic has such an insanely high skill cap but relatively low skill floor resulting in an extremely fun game for the majority of people who chose to learn.

In conclusion, DbD is a very fun game as a casual player and as a hardcore one. While there may be some small toxic elements to the game, especially at the higher level, the majority of the game is really fun and rewarding to play. 9/10 buy if you're willing to learn some [b]looping[/b] mechanics as it's well worth it.

Edit: Don't play this game at night as the quality of the games becomes garbage. Rank 1 killers vs 4 rank ~10s is common at night. Just play during peak hours to actually have a chance at enjoying the game.

这个游戏现在有一个很大的问题，那就是车队问题。在白天屠夫排不到，晚上人类排不到。于是乎晚上我不得不开始玩屠夫，连着完了两三局，总是被群殴，退出来定眼一看！您猜猜怎莫招？好家伙我一个排位20的萌新屠夫，居然匹配到了九段十段大佬，豁——那开关手电的速度，在下真是马尘不急，好不容易抓到个人对面三个都开始拱我。诶呦我的麻油，随着一阵抽搐，身体仿佛被掏空了，先在原地喘两下，三个人也变成了四个人，嗯没错就是四个人，还居然在老夫面前做起来蹲起，好家伙，看到如此当今社会居然还有这般有伤风俗的动作，这在下怎么能忍，当然上去让他们领教什么叫做屠夫之名不可欺，结果呢也不用多说了，看看为什么我在这里吧
